pageProduct.name: Trilogy Vitamin C Moisturising Lotion 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A light hydration lotion

Warnings

To ensure compatibility we recommend patch testing before first use in the unlikely event of a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult your medical professional.

Common Uses

Hydrates, brightens and illuminates dull complexions with vitamin C, daisy extract and rosehip oil.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Coco-Caprylate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin (Vegetable), Bellis Perennis (Daisy) Flower Extract, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Cetearyl Wheat Straw Glycosides (and) Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin) Peel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (vitamin E), Xanthan Gum, Parfum, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxycitronellal, Eugenol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Caprylhydroxamic (and) Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Apply to cleansed face, neck and décolletage morning and/or night. For even brighter results, use in conjunction with Vitamin C Booster Treatment.
